doc:
James Villiers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Villiers 0 James Michael Hyde Villiers (29 September 1933 – 18 January 1998) was an English character actor and a familiar face on British television. Villiers was particularly memorable for his plummy voice and ripe articulation. He has been credited with originating the use of the word "luvvie" to describe members of the acting profession. James_Michael_Hyde_Villiers ( 29_September_1933 – 18_January_1998 ) was an_English_character_actor and a_familiar_face on British_television . Villiers was particularly_memorable for his_plummy_voice and ripe_articulation . He has_been_credited with originating the_use of the_word_"_luvvie " to_describe members of the_acting_profession .
